description: Retrieve the latest status of a segment snapshot.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the domain.

parameters.name: SegmentDefinitionName
parameters.description: The unique name of the segment definition.

parameters.name: SnapshotId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the segment snapshot.

nested_items.name: SnapshotId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the segment snapshot.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the asynchronous job for exporting the segment snapshot.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message of the asynchronous job for exporting the segment snapshot.

nested_items.name: DataFormat
nested_items.description: The format in which the segment will be exported.

nested_items.name: EncryptionKey
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the KMS key used to encrypt the exported segment.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that allows Customer Profiles service principal to assume the role for conducting KMS and S3 operations.

nested_items.name: DestinationUri
nested_items.description: The destination to which the segment will be exported. This field must be provided if the request is not submitted from the Amazon Connect Admin Website.
